lender.name: Rick and Janis
lender.loan_because: It is easy and I think it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Principal

lender.name: Michigan 7th graders
lender.loan_because: We loaned because we realized that we have the opportunity to change someones life. We hope our money will help this person help themselves and others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: We are hard working 7th grade students who raised money to help others in need.

lender.name: Quoc
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a great idea.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is fun.
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice as a consultant, and do a little bit of teaching...

lender.name: monica
lender.loan_because: I believe that the key to world peace is helping each other. It is a joy and privilege to be able to help someone better their life through their own effort and hard work.

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: I like to share.

lender.name: Pey-hwa
lender.loan_because: I'd like to experience help someone far away from me. To experience the impact of my little money to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a finance reporter in Taiwan.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way I can! It feels like every probelm is SO very big that baby steps are never enough, but now I know I can help. Even if it is just a tiny bit!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an art gallery and sell artwork.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I help computer resellers understand new technology so they can better run their business.

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: it is a small way to humbly help on a one to one basis others who have not been born into a comfortable First World life with all its privileges and opportunities.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: People deserve a helping hand
lender.occupational_info:
Healing from Within--Mind, Body, Spirit.
Dr. Dorothy has the unique gift of connecting people with a broad range of profound principles that resonate in the deepest part of their being. She brings awareness to concepts not typically obvious to one's daily thoughts and feelings.
Biography
Dorothy M. Neddermeyer, PhD, has 33 years experience with healing, personal development and peak performance. She developed a unique process to Create Your Dynamic Future. This process teaches people how to consciously access their innate power to both heal illnesses and blockages and to create unlimited success.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the most useful classes students will ever take (introductory psychology and statistics).

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have the means, and Kiva has a way. Anything can help.

lender.name: Alfonso
lender.loan_because: I can be the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I make medical education and workplace safety videos for the web and DVD.

lender.name: Karen H
lender.loan_because: My family is long established in this country, dating back to the Mayflower in the 17th century, and every succeeding generation has had the support of the previous one. Not everyone in the world, or even in the US, has this kind of support. We want to offer support to those lacking it.
lender.occupational_info: Now that I am retired from teaching, my son and I are raising organic vegetables for local restaurants while my retired husband is raising corn and/or soybeans for the commodities market. We also board 30 horses on our property, and sell the honey from our son's 24 beehives.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: If I don't, this huge monkey armed with a piece of 6-by-4 crawls out of the woodwork behind my house and belts me across the back of the head with it. Believe me this hurts. It is much easier just lending the money.
lender.occupational_info: A recovering Lurgi sufferer, I learned to play in a Brass band in 1954. I've never looked back since. I don't look forward either. Tuba's are difficult like that.

lender.name: Deepti
lender.occupation: Engineer and Part time Journalism Student
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be where I am at today and I would like to give back to the community esp those who are making the effort to live a good life!
lender.occupational_info: I am getting a part-time business degree at HAAS and I and looking to make a career transition.

lender.name: Bri
lender.occupational_info: Studying economics and political science.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. Thankfully, my circumstances are such that I am able to provide for myself and others.

lender.name: Dianna
lender.loan_because: It just feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I study the buying behaviors of consumers and businesses so that I can help my clients sell their products more effectively.

lender.name: Tink
lender.loan_because: Others have been so generous to me when I've been going through rough times. This is one way that I can "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate effectively, and I teach others how to do the same.

lender.name: Marine
lender.loan_because: Soyez le changement que vous voulez voir dans le monde .GANDHI
lender.occupational_info: call center

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world is my neighbor

lender.name: NKU Ed. Students
lender.loan_because: We think it is up to each of us to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We are preparing to be teachers in schools in the USA.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to do something redemptive with my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with middle school and high school students.

lender.name: Birthe
lender.loan_because: I hope that even a small amount can make a big change!

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: God has been generous to me and my family and I want to pass that on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers decide what they need in a computer system.

lender.name: Jason Gendler
lender.loan_because: People who work hard deserve opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Very hard worker myself running multiple online companies. I love creating new things and seeing them grow from a simple idea. I believe that the harder you work, the luckier you get.

lender.name: georgia
lender.loan_because: i want to help others
lender.occupational_info: computer geekess, working with servers now more than desktops

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe that I am my brother's and sister's keeper and out of many, we are one.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of two young daughters. My husband is a military officer. I am trained as someone who teaches young children how to read and helps them when they have trouble.

lender.name: Jediyaya
lender.loan_because: It's good medicine.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: This loan was done on behalf of the ladies of the St. Andrews Woman's Club of SC--International Affairs Dept.

lender.name: Sam Lanzo
lender.loan_because: The tragedy of the commons is far too common.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student going to school to work with computers and information stored on them.

lender.name: Kirstin
lender.loan_because: I care...
lender.occupational_info: I help students and their parents figure out how they can pay for college - working with a non profit organization

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their full potential. I believe if we all help each other out a little bit, the world will be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: A friend and I have started our own green marketing and events company, which we run out of her home. We work primarily with responsible, progressive companies to produce sustainable events and tours, as well as help connect companies to each other to form beneficial partnerships. Our ultimate goal is to educate people, and alter consumer behavior and purchasing decisions.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I think that the micro-loan movement is a great way to support global entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I belive in the golden rule..

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: i would like to help people who are not as lucky as me.
lender.occupational_info: i learn lots in school.

lender.name: Jon and Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe I have a responsibility to share my wealth.
lender.occupational_info: Teach mathematics to teenagers in public school.

lender.name: Erik&Cammie
lender.loan_because: We want to help people reach goals in areas were resources are less plentiful than ours.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I prefer helping those who attempt to help themselves

lender.name: dipan
lender.loan_because: I want to chage the world one loan at a time.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: microloans are a great way to provide individuals with the means to change their lives. It is a way that I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that items of historical or cultural importance are not destroyed. I am interested in learning about our shared pasts.

lender.name: NHS_Business_Academy
lender.loan_because: This is a great class project to teach about microlending and the power of individuals to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I try to inspire students to tap into their limitless potential and make a positive impact on sociiety.

lender.name: Virgil
lender.loan_because: Makes me feel good about life!
lender.occupational_info: I worked non stop for 22 years. finally at the point of were i am i can easily say i wake up everyday, put my robe on, and enjoy life.

lender.name: Pranil
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who help themselves.

lender.occupational_info: Benedictine monastic (sister)Monastery Book & GIft Shop Manager Stained glass artisan

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: It's amazing how even a little amount can really help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I study the German language and also teach German to university students.

lender.loan_because: alot of people doing little things, taking small steps can still make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.occupational_info: We recycle metal wood and cardboard

lender.loan_because: i want to be the change i wish to see in the world :)
lender.occupational_info: student!

lender.name: BoRt
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people the opportunity to earn the Award for Outstanding Achievement in the Field of Excellence.

lender.name: Lupa
lender.loan_because: If I can help make someone's life better through my donation, it's worth it. Thank you, Kiva, for making this program possible!

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Alex Curavo
lender.occupation: Student / President of Ashland University SIFE
lender.loan_because: Thanks to my involvement with Ashland University Students in Free Enterprise and Esperanza, I have seen how microfinance changes the lives of so many in third world countries around the world.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I like the model of helping people help themselves. I think it's important to a person's sense of accomplishment to be able to repay a loan. I think these loans will help people become more self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites on the computer (websites like Kiva.org).

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's a small amount of money that can greatly benefit the lives of those in developing nations. Since I have the money to loan, I feel I almost HAVE to loan to help out other people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to Graduate school at the University of Idaho where I research different neuroscience topics.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It is a better way to help people than making a donation. It gives both sides pride in the transaction.

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: I learn stuff.

lender.name: Rikey
lender.loan_because: I want to invest people worth helping, while being benefited from those who are benefited from my investment.
lender.occupational_info: It's difficult to describe my work in few words. In summary, my work is about arts, art festival and artist. To network with people within or without life experiences similar with me.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I hope these small loans will help the hard working people who receive them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm developing "safety at work" electronic components for automation technology.

lender.name: curzio
lender.loan_because: why not? :)

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because:
"I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do." - Edward Everett Hale
Thanks to Karoline in Norway who put this quotation on Kiva friends and which resumes very well my thoughts.

lender.name: marzia
lender.loan_because: I believe it really makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I travel to the far east to buy clothes then I sell them where I live (in Spain) trying to make women happy by feeling good about themselves!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good - and is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I believe in the "pass it on" philosiphy and that it is man's responsibility to care for other people that are willing to help themselves. This type of loan program is an opportunity to help those that will hopefully one day be able to go on to help others themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time engaging new customers to ensure that our products meet their requirements.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can for others in need - enabling them to live their life, not just survive it.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: helping people improve their situation and enriching them and their families lives is very rewarding all round. Knowing you made a difference is a more meaningful return than other investments that offer only a monetary yield.
lender.occupational_info: I work in investments and as a technical writer. No investment can make the personal impact that this kind of investing can. Visiting some of the people I lent to in Cambodia only left me more convinced of the impact of these loans and was a truly remarkable experience!

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them develop better products by speaking with their customers and finding out what is important to them

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: And I say unto you, Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness; that, when ye fail, they may receive you into everlasting habitations.

lender.name: Arta & Tom
lender.occupational_info: Numbers & Reports

lender.name: Anton Elbers
lender.loan_because: People supporting each other is a longstanding tradition among rural people. With Kiva it's possible to support people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I've been working on the land for the last 35 years growing vegetables and fruit, mostly apples.

lender.name: Andi
lender.loan_because: The world will be a better place only if we make it.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it will make a difference.

lender.name: Stacia
lender.loan_because: It's such a small way to make a big impact ... why would I not?

lender.name: Mary Ellen
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to share the wealth we enjoy with those who face great obstacles but are willing to work hard to succeed if given the opportunity and the resources required.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired teacher, I have time to do volunteer work. I try to focus on things that will help others by working through my church and community organizations. I also belong to Friendship Force which promotes exchanges with people around the world in order to promote friendship among all peoples.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I help build the examinations that people must take to prove that they are competent in their health profession.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe the opportunity I've been given to produce my music should always serve a greater purpose. If music can change lives in many ways, this one is another way of serving that purpose.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with computer networking.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I can and my parents raised me well.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand what a difference it makes! The sacrifice of a loan is negligible when you see the impact it has on the recipient, their families, and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I previously worked for a company that implements USAID-funded programs around the world. I've worked on a food security and agriculture projects in Nigeria and Afghanistan. I have also worked on development projects in Egypt, Morocco, Ethiopia, and Washington DC.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I like to see people achieving their dreams for themselves.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am the coordinator of a community college tutoring and computer lab. I also help tradtional and non-traditional students with their computer skills.

lender.name: Todd & Michi
lender.loan_because: Michi wants to learn about microfinance. Todd wants to engage with the world.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Design products with solid state lighting.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: It's like charity that keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a primary school (ages 5-11) and support students and teachers to help them all make good choices.

lender.name: Bill & Jamie
lender.loan_because: Two people CAN make a difference

lender.name: Roger & Jill
lender.loan_because: I respect people who work hard to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I try to make a difference in the world; no matter how small.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the cash and investments of a financial institution.

lender.name: Mariel
lender.loan_because: This is the most effective way to support the local economy in places where I cannot easily be.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school math teacher and coach. I feel lucky to be able to do what I love.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Dorothy Day told me to.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and tell computers what to do. I went to school for years and years to do this for some reason.

lender.name: Ankur
lender.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurs all over the world in their mission
lender.occupational_info: Changing the world one step at a time

lender.name: Jean & Philip
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the opportunity to help someone succeed in life.

lender.name: Edna Mode
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and I'd like to share that fortune

lender.name: Wendy Knafla
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get to where they want to go in the world.

lender.name: Karaam
lender.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to help entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Technological Updates to Old established Business Models. Distruptive Innovation. Web Domain Trader.

lender.name: Fred - Senior Lender
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have everything I have. I like to help others and this is an opportunity to aid and encourage others to build a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Michelle and Paul
lender.loan_because: we received something for free and are now paying it forward!!

lender.occupational_info: Finding homes for people in beautiful Florida.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.occupational_info: I help make websites. I work with people to help them figure out what they want on a website and how the website will work.

I believe we experience by stepping into the unfamiliar.
I believe we grow through community and self-reflection.
I believe everyone deserves to experience growth.

lender.name: Honnee
lender.loan_because: I like to give and help people get to their next level.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get jobs

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help others in need.

lender.name: Theresa Crowley
lender.loan_because:
I have been blessed beyond belief.
It is an honor to be able to give something back.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, it feels good and it will be fun to follow people in their efforts to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: Medical doctor who works with people having mental and emotional problems.

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: My life is incredibly blessed. I will empower other women to build better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am Executive Administrative Assistant to an Executive Director in a city of +/-150,000.

lender.name: Haofeng
lender.loan_because: It's a right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of Society of Wilderness (SOW) Taiwan and Wildfowl & Wetlands Trust (WWT) UK and have been doing fundraising for charities as a volunteer.

lender.name: Sujai
lender.loan_because: thats my little way of giving back to society and empower others to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology with interests in making this world a better place.

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: Helping to make miracles is good for the soul.
lender.occupational_info: I teach marketing and communications to university and college students. I have a special interest in Social Marketing which uses traditional marketing techniques to sell ideas like "community improvement", "better health" and "environmental improvement".

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: When I need money I love it if there's someone there to lend it to me.

lender.name: In Memoriam: Meredith
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help others build a better life withhout compromising their dignity or integrity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to open up more sources of information to more people.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans are amazing! I visit Kiva.org and immediately fall in love some beautiful entrepreneur. It's amazing to be a poor student and still be able to make a difference in someone's life. I especially love getting to learn about the entrepreneur and knowing exactly what the loan is going toward. It's way too much fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. And student. I make things and occasionally people buy them.

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: as bad as things are for me, there's always someone doing it tougher... I'm a virtual shut-in, all alone. I've known hunger, cold, & lonliness. WE ALL NEED TO SHARE WHAT LITTLE WE HAVE.
lender.occupational_info: I am no longer able to work, & live in a small house on an acre of land in tasmania, Australia with two dogs & a pet cow & a pet bull. It's very cold here, but at least I OWN IT... AM VERY LUCKY.

lender.name: NKU Students in EDU300
lender.loan_because: We want to invest in future generations to make a difference in the world. People helping people is what it is all about..
lender.occupational_info: We are students in college preparing for careers in education.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: It's such a small amount and so many seem to need it more than I.
lender.occupational_info: People need a place to live but can't afford their own house. I find a place for them.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the good fortune to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a story teller.

lender.name: Jolene
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at some point. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I received this as a gift certificate

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the abundance in my life and it is fitting that I share my time, talents and treasure with others.
lender.occupational_info: I write books about the workplace, fostering a sense of community among people, mediation, activism and poetry.

lender.name: don
lender.loan_because: trying to buy my way into heaven.........lol

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in life and would like to help others.

lender.name: State College H.S. Kiva
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make this world a better place where all people can live a happy and healthy life.
lender.occupational_info: We are the State College Area High School Kiva Club

lender.occupational_info: Technical Marketing for computers

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Rhodes College in Memphis, Tennessee.

lender.name: KJS
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of micro-lending.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure computer programs work properly.

lender.name: George & Dawn
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: George is retired military and a teacher in D.C. Dawn is a Trade Specialist

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I do not have a huge amount to invest but my wife, son and little girl would like to make some small investments so that we can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help those who lead and manage others in all types of organizations learn how to treat people with courtesy and respect and help people better their lives. You can visit my complete portfolio at www.linkedin.com/in/wetherhaven

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: My son, Robby introduced me to this website and this concept and I love it. How cool to pool our resources, however meager, and be able to make such a difference in others' lives. What Would Jesus Do?
lender.occupational_info: I have 4 kids, 2 already grown and 2 grandkids! I am a homeschooling mom and my husband and I are small business owners. My hubby and I created HOMESCHOOLOPOLY® a homeschool board game, and I am the author of: "Homeschooling | The Journey is The Reward". My husband is a software genius and the breadwinner of the family. The majority of our income comes from his side of the business: Berthume Software. www.berthume.com www.homeschoolopoly.com

lender.name: Eradio Y Georgina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. We have our health and jobs and we are blessed.

lender.name: Debs
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office in the construction industry.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because:
"Aspire not to have more, but to be more"
-Oscar Romero
lender.occupational_info:
Just finished my master's in public policy.
Working to save the world....

lender.name: Ms. Dawn M.
lender.loan_because: Seeing a person as they want to be is halfway to getting there.
lender.occupational_info: as varied as my interests.

lender.name: Randy Wu
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian.
lender.occupational_info: do marketing for company.

lender.name: NANA
lender.loan_because: As a traditional ruler in a rural community, I need to see to it that my people get better living, more especially the youth to become employable. This can work properly by providing them with small loans as a start up capital.
lender.occupational_info: This activity helps to reduce rural - urban migration, teenage pregnancy, armed robbery and unemployment rate. As a traditional ruler and Accountant as well, I provide them with financial management and entrepreneurial skills that enable them to work properly with the money given to them and return it in due time . I also make sure that there is no bad debt in the system.In order to let enough people enjoy this special strtegy, I need a little support for expansion to cover a wide area. Any lender may join it without fear.

lender.name: Adonicus
lender.loan_because:
Wine of Omar Khayyám Eugene Lee-Hamilton
He rode the flame-winged dragon-steed of Thought Through Space and Darkness, seeking Heaven and Hell; And searched the furthest stars where souls might dwell To find God's justice: and in vain he sought.
Then, looking on the dusk-eyed girl who brought His dream-filled wine beside his garden-well, He said: "Her kiss; the wine-jug's drowsy spell; Bulbul; the roses; death; ... all else is naught:
So drink till that." -- What, drink, because the abyss Of Nothing waits? because there is for man But one swift hour of consciousness and light?
No, -- just because we have no life but this, Turn it to use; be noble while you can; Search, help, create; then pass into the night.

lender.name: neil
lender.loan_because: For my albums.
lender.occupational_info: It's so Nice.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because:
I focus on lending for arable farming.
In order to discover suitable borrowers I wrote a program which searches all current Kiva loans every 5 minutes and looks for new loans which meet my criteria, and when they do sends me an email and sms. Others use it too. It is more powerful than Kiva's auto-lend criteria.
I am happy to provide it to anyone else who is interested!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world" -Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: University lecturer.

lender.name: Petunia
lender.loan_because:
My life has been changed by the kindness of strangers. I'd like to think I could make a small difference in someone's life like that too.
I chose my first loan in honor of one of my favorite couples, Kevin & Diana, to celebrate not only their engagement, but also their friendship. Congrats and thanks bunches!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves without the worry of the money going into someone elses pocket
lender.occupational_info: I run an business selling phamaceutical equipment to other pharmaceutical companies

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am and want to help others. This site makes it very easy!

lender.name: Susan Z.
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to reach out around the whole world and help people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: By lending a hand to someone that is eager to work hard to improve makes the future brighter and better for everyone.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: money should be made to serve mankind, not the other way around.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office writing the computer code for video games.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: the Lord has blessed me with a good job, where I can do what I enjoy. I want to help others support their families by working at what they enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage warehouses and delivery trucks.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: people in the developing world deserve economic opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about globalization and cultural change.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I like to support persons with dreams and spirit to change .

lender.name: Kimberleigh
lender.loan_because:
It's a joy to give and to be able to help someone less fortunate. And I respect people who take a proactive role in working to improve the quality of their lives.
Matthew 6 : 19-21, Luke 12 : 48(b)

lender.name: Montano - Schiermeyer
lender.loan_because: I want to help change lives for the better. I want to be a good role mother for my children.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I think this program is a wonderful idea. You can actually see the people you are helping. It's great to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I have a web hosting company. It's a quick and affordable way for people to get their own business. Visit my website for your hosting and registration needs.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: some people are not as fortunate as us and we need to help them because they need help

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: i'm going to a bingo event tonight...at which all the proceeds are going to Kiva.

lender.name: Mowe family
lender.loan_because: We like the idea that we can do something to help someone else who is in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help to maintain computerised administration systems that are used to help people save money for themselves for when they are too old to work.

lender.name: Abednego Coffee
lender.loan_because: It gives people a chance to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Roast and drink a lot of coffee.

lender.name: Brittani
lender.loan_because: People deserve to have a good life because life is too short to live the same day twice...especially when your living a bad life every day of your life. I think that by helping these people, their life will be better and my life will be better because I know that I have made a difference in someone else's life, however small it may be. ...(Do I say "life" alot?)
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every day and learn things for the future.

lender.name: SC Universalist
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, I work but don't get paid.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I'm fund of the idea of Kiva - and I like to make a difference in some peoples life with a helping hand.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: If not me then who, if not now then when?
lender.occupational_info: I help business conduct their work more efficiently through the use of computers.

lender.name: Cal
lender.loan_because: It's an easy, fun, and inexpensive way to help others to improve their lives.

lender.name: Quinn
lender.loan_because: Well I am pretty new to this so i really don't know a whole lot about this
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a high school student trying to get all my high school credits to get into college. I plan to attend college in the fall of 2009 and major in either art or graphic design or maybe both. I want to become either a graphic designer or a cartoonist. I run track for my high school and i play basketball for a recreational team. I like to watch television, play video games, of course i love to draw, i like to chill with my friends, meet new people, and do anything basically that keeps me occupied or busy

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people improving their lives by being entrepreneurs. I think that kind of change is much more sustainable then charity.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I can! My job requires me to travel around the globe and this has allowed me to gain a little perspective about the quality of life we enjoy in Canada. The tiny amount of money I loan can help people better there lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a toy company.

lender.name: brenne
lender.loan_because: to help the women with their job because they work hard

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: My Dad taught me that those who have, should help those who don't.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, making games for people to play on their computers and consoles.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship can help struggling communities and countries chart a course to a sustainable future by putting the resources needed to work with willing hands to create a better future for entrepreneurs, their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the federal government of Canada where I was responsible for the development of entrepreneurship-friendly policies.

lender.name: reynard
lender.loan_because: it's everyone's
lender.occupational_info: broke travelling rainbow kid

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: My aunt got me involved with the Kiva program as a gift. I checked out the website and thought it was a good way to give back and help out in the world.

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: I ascribe to the George Bailey school of banking.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the copper mining industry in Arizona, USA.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be part of the world family. We are all one body, one body in Christ. We do not stand alone.
lender.occupational_info: Child of God, Wife, Mom of four and Nana of nine :)

lender.name: HORTENCIA
lender.loan_because:
It makes me feel good to know I can make a difference in someone's life. These are hard working people that need our help.
Me hace sentirme bien saber que puedo hacer algo para ayudar ha alguien. Esta gente necesitan nuestra ayuda.
lender.occupational_info:
I work with computers.
Trabajo con computadoras.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.

lender.name: m&m and gg
lender.loan_because: It gives individuals or families who aren't as wealthy as us a chance to start a business so they can support themselves.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. I play the tenor sax. I play soccer.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at some point in their life

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to directly help someone who works hard and wants to improve. We can all do better if we work together.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults how to communicate better through classes in business writing and public speaking.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: So many women in the world have so few opportunities, and I want to do something to help.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves protecting children from abuse and neglect, and helping families overcome problems like drug addiction and poverty.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: The needs/wants of members are so minimal compared to the needs/wants of people in my own country. What we waste at leisurely pleasures can -in itself-help sustain the lives of Kiva members. One would have to be very selfish and egregiously selfish to NOT extended one's self when the gift is so small---yet the reward is so great/monlithic---to say the least.
lender.occupational_info: I advice individuals on laws and regulations. I also help individuals settle disputes and "possible" come to a resolution.

lender.name: LISA
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN PEOPLES LIVES.
lender.occupational_info: I SELL ON EBAY. THIS IS THE ONLY THING I CAN DO RIGHT NOW BECAUSE MY HUSBAND WORKS OUT OF STATE & WE HAVE NO CHILDCARE.

lender.name: Akemi
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and inspired to help other entrepreneurs worldwide. We are all connected. Thanks for the opportunities to give.
lender.occupational_info: I read people's soul records (called Akashic Records) and clear the energetic issues that affect us mentally, emotionally, and even physically. I also facilitate intuition development coaching program.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state housing department. My agency regulates rents for thousands of apartments in New York City.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I can, I want to, I should do and it's fun.
lender.occupational_info: I help people decide how to invest their money for the future

lender.name: Anqi
lender.loan_because: You can give a man a fish, or you can teach him how to fish. I believe in the power of small business run by the individual, for the individual, not only to build a sustainable living, but also to stimulate an entire community's economy. I want to share what I have with those who need and deserve it the most.
lender.occupational_info: By training, I am an electrical engineer, but currently I am pursuing graduate studies in business economics. I study how market transactions occur and recommend government policies to improve the way goods are distributed. Eventually, I hope to start my own business. In my free time, I love to read, write stories, and draw.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea that every man and woman should have the chance to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the design and construction of the physical environment.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I want to see people do well

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance: it brings poor people out of a key expolitative cycle often involving powerful local moneylenders. It empowers people and supports self-determination. It starts off small and becomes bigger.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Australian Indigenous and non-Indigenous people on land issues, and land use and land management planning by groups, communities and individuals; supporting sustainable economies, empowering local people.

lender.name: Gleyenna
lender.loan_because: I get great pleasure seeing people (specially family and friends) succeed in their craft or profession.

lender.name: Kaelyn Forde
lender.loan_because: My experience within Asian and Latin American developing nations has been that poverty and the despair it creates are endless until a functioning civil society can be established. The chronically undernourished, the illiterate and the ethnically marginalized cannot build economic, civil and democratic institutions. A strong, efficacious middle class has historically demanded the environmental, educational, political, economic, civil and judicial reforms that many countries so desperately need. It develops human capital, empowers women and families and sustains entire communities. I first became interested in micro-finance while working as a correspondent in Cambodia; I saw land mine amputees and Khmer Rouge veterans regain their dignity and independence by selling books rather than begging.
lender.occupational_info: I aspire to work as a trilingual foreign correspondent in Latin America for an international television news network. I will also write, shoot, edit and produce a documentary accompaniment to my honors thesis, coalescing my dual degrees in Broadcast Journalism and International Relations. I believe film brings us closer than words can.

lender.name: Blossomsk
lender.loan_because: I always get the greatest gift in giving. It brings me such joy.

lender.name: Teo and Melissa
lender.loan_because: We are making a personal investment to help enrich people's lives and eliminate poverty.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: To share the resources I've been given.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: local knowledge is important and should be supported over foreign development campaigns.
lender.occupational_info: I support and facilitate coalitions finding community assets that can change their health and well-being.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I loan because everyone deserves to be able to make a living, and if that means me or other people having to help them out a bit, well then I'll do it. The point in life to enjoy yourself, and when you don't have money in a world that revolves around money, then people with enough should help those who don't have enough enjoy their life. You only have one life so you better enjoy it while you can! -Elisabeth
lender.occupational_info: I am a novelist. Nothing has been published yet, but I'm still working toward my goal; to publish a novel.

lender.name: Jeri B
lender.occupational_info: I help adults learn to read, write, use numbers, and use computers.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Just like these folks, I also needed help to start in business. What a great opportunity to do the same for others!
lender.occupational_info: Businessman & promoter of the arts.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: If I'm honest, because I don't do much in the way of helping others. So it's about time eh...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company who manufacture sand paper, you may have come across it if you've ever worked with wood or metal. It's used to prepare, clean or smoothen surfaces. It's not rocket science but it's a good job which has seen me travel to some interesting places.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe that asking for what you need is brave and needs as much support as I can give it.
lender.occupational_info: I hire people to work for a great company and listen to there concerns so that it is easier for them to focus on work.

lender.name: Sand
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to start environmentally friend businesses, such as recycling or eco-tours, it's definately the way of the future!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure doctors practice medicine safely

lender.name: catalyst
lender.loan_because: we are a developing business and would like to assist entrepreneurs in other parts of the world establish themselves and build a better lifestyle for their families
lender.occupational_info: we provide services to financial services businesses in australia

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I want a better world; where people are given fair working conditions and are given a decent wage for an honest days work!! I want poverty and injustice everywhere to end! "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere" - martin luther king jr

lender.name: Bert & Saskia
lender.loan_because: To support people in making a better living

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have a wonderful family and live a great life. To have the opportunity to help others reach for their dreams gives me a great sense of self fulfillment.
lender.occupational_info: I use my talents and resources in the technology sector to make Africa a better place to live and work for all Africans.

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: I want to help fellow entrepreneurs make their dreams a reality and improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-employed medical biller, and this year we adopted our 2yo daughter from Ethiopia.

lender.name: Nathan & Amy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I received a credit for our wedding. Now we want to share it with anyone who has a need.
lender.occupational_info: I go to many different schools to teach children how to express themselves. My wife teaches those who have problems learning.

lender.name: Bobbi, Kristy & Sam
lender.loan_because: As a family, we wanted to help people around the globe grow their businesses and livelihoods and learn together what impact small loans can make.

lender.name: Macy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be healthy and happy.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's satisfying to make a direct and positive difference in a stranger's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of social media and socialengagement....a bit theoritical. It's nice to help directly as well.

lender.name: Michelle & kids
lender.loan_because: I'm a world citizen living consciously
lender.occupational_info: helping people of different cultures understand one another

lender.name: HMCCC Sunday School
lender.loan_because: By reinvesting, we can use our bake sale proceeds to create an ever-increasing outreach to people all over the world!

lender.name: HoneybeeHill
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about the empowerment of others.
lender.occupational_info: I sew and make reusable cloth products for women, children and families -- including cloth menstrual pads, cloth diapers and cloth napkins/lunchsacks and reusable shopping bags.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping to empower ambitious people with great ideas.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Through sharing I can empower others to be a positive force in life and in turn it becomes my blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I help others to find their voice and share their voice both therapeutically as a Speech Language Pathologist as well as a poet and as a Life Coach.

lender.name: Jie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people than can earn their life by own hands.
lender.occupational_info: Dealing with software

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's the very least I can do

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the website of the Los Angeles Times newspaper. You can visit us anytime at http://www.latimes.com.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.occupation: Bank manager,helped set up three schools.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's a pretty smart way to make an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I help train people in companies

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I care. And because loans are not a hand out -- they are a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Working on renewable energy issues for the Air Force with Marstel-Day, LLC.

lender.name: Lee Ying
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Susie, Encinitas, CA USA
lender.occupation: Event Manager for an educational non-profit
lender.occupational_info: Our company trains teachers to help students get to college. Many of these students will be the first in their families to attend college. I plan the trainings. We meet in 8 cities each summer and train about 2,000 educators in each city. It's a lot of work but fun and rewarding!

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with sufficient money so I want to share it with others. I think loaning money through Kiva is a great way encourage small families in 3rd world countries to support themselves. I visited Cambodia and have a particular love for the people of this country and want to help in any way I can.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: This is my small contribution to counteract the disproportionate injustice and suffering in the world... From those to whom much is given...much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I educate doctors about new medications with which to treat their patients' illnesses.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Nyla & Alex
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: ROBERTA
lender.loan_because: I have an extremely caring daughter who supports Kiva. I want to join her on this journey to make a difference in the world. I am blessed to live in a country where one can succeed with hard work and determination, and want to help others do the same.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a wonderful & fufilling life. Why not share some happiness with others?

lender.name: Southern Growth
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and Product Innovation

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: I choose the children's clothing that will be available to buy in a large department store.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I believe it's everyone's responsibility to do something to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others get started.
lender.occupational_info: I build electric generating plants

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I get to help fellow humans feel empowered.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I want people to know someone cares about them and considers them a neighbor, because the community we live in isn't just our "backyard" but the world!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people an opportunity to get ahead.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: It keeps me grateful for what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor and mentor kids K-12 who are tribal members of the Pokagon Band of Potawatomi Indians.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I loan because for my birthday, my aunt got me a Kiva gift card. It's a great way to help other people out there that aren't as fortunate, but work hard to do what ever work they do.

lender.name: Sasha
lender.occupation: Associate at an international development group

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard to make their life better. I benefited from many people's kindness throughout my life. I hope I can repay part of the benefits I got by helping other people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a finance professional in the United State. I teach people how to invest and managing money.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and want to share what I have with others.

lender.name: Victor, Mara y Gos
lender.loan_because: We, Victor and Mara's parents like our children to be aware of how much they can do. They will tell the story at school and spread the word.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in foreign policy research institutes, trying to frame progressive foreign policy

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: I believe in all possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their homes energy efficient, comfortable, and safe.

lender.name: Yasmine
lender.loan_because: it is important to extend a helping hand to those who need it most. I believe that everyone has the right to live a decent, healthy life with the basic necessities of food, shelter and clothing. I also believe that it is important to care and be supportive of others.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to know that I can help someone who needs it more than I do.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should have a chance to live their life to the fullest.

lender.name: Ignacio
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Illinois, i also work at a bar, my job consists mostly of cleaning and security.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get started!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students to be globally aware - and show them that there are ways to be personally involved in making a better world!!!

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: when I read the requests, how could I not?

lender.name: Jason and Melissa
lender.loan_because: This was our wedding gift to our guests - in our day of happiness, we wanted to share our good fortune with others.

lender.name: Brenda and Dave
lender.loan_because: giving and helping others is something that we do. This is the first time we have been able to help outside of our local community - thank you Kiva!!

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to make someone's life better.
